location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to Alfred Cotton Way

mods.abstract: Letter requesting that Way travel to the arab coast to look into some proceedings involving the Sheikh of Shargah [Sharjah] (Khalid bin Sultan al-Qasimi) and informing him that he has written to Government for instructions regarding the Aboothabee [Abu Dhabi] Chief (Shaikh Zayid bin Khalifah).The letter also reports that Aujam [Henjam] is to be a telegraph station and general station and that Way's headquarters will have to be moved there and that Mr Gaspar de Rozario will be his Doctor there.
